ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the duration of the
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the duration of the [healthcare encounter/HOTERM]?

ReferenceDocuments.name: HODUR
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM-based dataset, concatenate the CDASH collected duration and collected duration unit and populate the SDTMIG variable HODUR in ISO 8601 Period format. Example: P1DT2H (for 1 day, 2 hours).

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Collected duration of the healthcare encounter. Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived from the start and end date/times.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the duration of the healthcare encounter.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG CRT Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Length of stay for this reporting period (Days)

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: If Intensive Care Unit Stay, how many days in the intensive care unit?
